definitions.definition: Minor items, not further defined. Incidental expense.
definitions.example: She's costing us a lot in incidentals.

definitions.definition: Loosely associated; existing as a byproduct, tangent, or accident; being a likely consequence.
definitions.example: That character, though colorful, is incidental to the overall plot.

definitions.definition: (of radiation) Entering or approaching, prior to reflection (more frequently incident).
